title: BTC_Mouse
author: BTC_Mouse
content: I need a loan but it is not right to apply because I am not a DT member since I need it I am applying for a loan if anyone is willing to give I will be glad.$1000 USDTPeriod: 1 MonthRepayment Amount: $1150 USDTReceiving address (USDT on TRC-20): Will Send in DM

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Quote from: Hodlshi on January 18, 2023, 08:50:18 AMCollateral?A month year old newbie account shouldn't ask for collateral, that's for the real members like shasan/condoras/etc to ask.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Quote from: AHOYBRAUSE on January 18, 2023, 09:15:32 AMQuote from: Hodlshi on January 18, 2023, 08:50:18 AMCollateral?A month year old newbie account shouldn't ask for collateral, that's for the real members like shasan/condoras/etc to ask.Dude why so abusive? there's nothing wrong for a newbie account asking for collateral and other details, even a scammer or red tagged user is completely fine if they're want to become a lender, not as a borrower since no one will believe it.The question is do you want to lend your money to @OP? if you want to lend any money, your post is pointless since you're not helping anyone here.

comments.author: Hodlshi
comments.body: Quote from: AHOYBRAUSE on January 18, 2023, 09:15:32 AMQuote from: Hodlshi on January 18, 2023, 08:50:18 AMCollateral?A month year old newbie account shouldn't ask for collateral, that's for the real members like shasan/condoras/etc to ask.I have enough money.I thought this section not for old lender only.

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Quote from: Plaguedeath on January 18, 2023, 09:20:24 AMQuote from: AHOYBRAUSE on January 18, 2023, 09:15:32 AMQuote from: Hodlshi on January 18, 2023, 08:50:18 AMCollateral?A month year old newbie account shouldn't ask for collateral, that's for the real members like shasan/condoras/etc to ask.Dude why so abusive? there's nothing wrong for a newbie account asking for collateral and other details, even a scammer or red tagged user is completely fine if they're want to become a lender, not as a borrower since no one will believe it.The question is do you want to lend your money to @OP? if you want to lend any money, your post is pointless since you're not helping anyone here.I wrote this because sending collateral to a 1 month old account is in a higher risk than sending a loan to an over 2 year long active member.Don't you agree?

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.created_time: January 18, 2023, 09:55:01 AMLast edit: January 18, 2023, 10:41:42 AM by AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on January 18, 2023, 09:52:41 AMI think both of you are trolling the thread.Quote from: AHOYBRAUSE on January 18, 2023, 09:49:19 AMYou make far more sense.Read the above.Nope, i just say that a newbie that would offer money but requires collateral is an even higher risk , for example for OP.Anyway, no reason to argue.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: I could not understand what was wrong if any newbie account even any negatively trusted user wanted to know about the collateral. It will not be a problem until the newbie account holder or the negatively trusted user wants to hold the collateral. A negatively trusted user or newbie user can accept the loan request and collateral can be held by a trusted escrow provider.

comments.author: BTC_Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on January 18, 2023, 04:36:42 PMI could not understand what was wrong if any newbie account even any negatively trusted user wanted to know about the collateral. It will not be a problem until the newbie account holder or the negatively trusted user wants to hold the collateral. A negatively trusted user or newbie user can accept the loan request and collateral can be held by a trusted escrow provider.Collateral I do not understand how to do and without it is not possible to get a loan ?

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: BTC_Mouse on January 19, 2023, 04:39:03 AMCollateral I do not understand how to do and without it is not possible to get a loan ?You can learn about collateral from here. Anyone may consider a non-collateral loan based on activity, merit, trust reputation), rank, etc. But regarding rank, reputation, and merit I do not think you will not get such a loan without collateral.Edit:You have not received any merit in 120 days.

comments.author: BTC_Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on January 19, 2023, 04:42:28 AMQuote from: BTC_Mouse on January 19, 2023, 04:39:03 AMCollateral I do not understand how to do and without it is not possible to get a loan ?You can learn about collateral from here. Anyone may consider a non-collateral loan based on activity, merit, trust reputation), rank, etc. But regarding rank, reputation, and merit I do not think you will not get such a loan without collateral.ok i understand this now it means my chance of getting loan is now zero percent thank you very much for sharing thisQuote from: shasan on January 19, 2023, 04:42:28 AMQuote from: BTC_Mouse on January 19, 2023, 04:39:03 AMEdit:You have not received any merit in 120 days.Another reason is that I have no Merit in 120 days, this is the main reason loan without Collateral.
